奛字的基本解释

奛
huǎng
开朗。

奛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huǎng］
［《集韻》户廣切，上蕩，匣。］
亦作“奛1”。
(1)照明；照亮。
(2)用同“晃”。摇动；摆动。
[②]［kuǎng］
［《廣韻》丘晃切，上蕩，溪。］
火光，灯火。
[③]［kuàng］
［《廣韻》苦謗切，去宕，溪。］
［《廣韻》呼晃切，上蕩，曉。］
［《廣韻》丘晃切，上蕩，溪。］
同“曠1”。
空旷明亮。参见“爌3炾”。

奛字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奛； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页252第14
【字彙】虛晃切，音汻。開明也。一曰奟字之譌。

奛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
奛字的起名意思

暂无。

奛
Basic explanation of words
奛
huǎng
Cheerful.
奛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huǎng］
["Ji Yun" household wide cut, upper swing, box. ]
Also known as "奛1".
(1) Illumination; Illumination.
(2) Use the same as "Hang". Shake; swing.
[②]［kuǎng］
["Guangyun" Qiu Huang cuts, swings up, and streams. ]
Fire, lights.
[③]［kuàng］
["Guangyun" bitterly slander, go to Dang, Xi. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Huang cut, swing, dawn. ]
["Guangyun" Qiu Huang cuts, swings up, and streams. ]
Same as "Kuang 1".
Open and bright. See "Chun 3 Qiang".
奛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Da Zi Department] 　奛; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 252 14
[Vocabulary] Xuhuang cut, Yinchuan. Enlightened also. One said the word "Zhao".
奛
